description:
In their second game of the Winter Cup, Seirin faces Nakamiya South.
Under Riko`s command, Seirin plays without Kuroko and Kagami. Unable to hit their stride, the team struggles. However, they manage to secure a victory due to their strong desire to become the best in Japan.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Comment voulez-vous que ce soit simple ?
軽いものなはずないだろう
